channel.description: HTML Hypertext Markup Language Developed by Tim Berners-Lee Defines the structure and content of the page Based on SGML, like XML HTML Element Image Credit: Wikipedia Basic HTML Page <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title><!-- The title of your page goes here --></title> <!-- other metadata about your page goes here --> </head> <body> <!-- The contents of your page go here --> </body> </html> CSS Cascading Style Sheets Defines the style of the page Stored in a Separate File Can be applied to multiple pages CSS Box Model Image Credit: Wikipedia
